payload.title: Overview
payload.description: The Data Usage Android Hero Path can assist with the following types of issues:

content.step: How to control data usage on one or multiple devices
How to view/manage data usage
High data usage

payload.title: Listed Steps
payload.subtitle: Troubleshooting (high data usage)
payload.description: Only proceed to the next step in the list if the previous step did not resolve the issue.

content.step: Connect to Wi-Fi (if available)
Disable Avoid Poor Connections in Advanced Wi-Fi settings
Close apps running in background
Disable Mobile Hotspot/hotspot devices
Check/adjust push notifications and account sync (i.e. email, Verizon Cloud, social media)
Disable automatic Play Store downloads over mobile data
Test device in Safe Mode for misbehaving apps
Disable Auto-sync data in settings
Power cycle after various changes are made
Disable mobile data
content.note: Note: Disable upon customer request; be sure to fully educate benefits and disadvantages of disabling mobile data

payload.title: Probing Questions
payload.description: The below questions will help in assisting with finding the root cause to a customers issue regarding Accessibility on an Android device.

content.step: Does the touchscreen seem unresponsive?
Does the screen display appear normal or have enlarged/large font?
Is the device talking to you?
What is it saying?
Do you have to touch the screen twice (or more) before being able to select anything?
Have any accessibility features been enabled recently?
Does the screen display colors differently?
Do the colors on the screen look brown?

payload.title: Overview
payload.description: The Accessibility for Android Hero Path can assist with the following types of issues:

content.step: Disabling TalkBack
Cannot read screen due to zoomed display/enlarged font
Gestures misbehaving
Colors on screen different/dark

payload.title: Listed Steps
payload.description: Only proceed to the next step in the list if the previous step did not resolve the issue.

tips.tip: For troubleshooting, utilize Mobile View/Rapid Remote In. If app not installed, offer assistance with installation. If unable to assist with installation of the app, remember to send a download link via text message for later installation
Look for this image  to indicate best instances to utilize Mobile View/Rapid Remote In

content.step: Disable Talkback/Driving Mode/Zoom/Change Font Size/Disable Gestures
content.note: If there is no change after disabling the feature, power cycle the device

content.step: Check for software and app updates
Safe mode
Reset Settings (select Android devices)
